name: VR Horror Survival Zombie Battle
description:
This is a shooting survival game. You will have to resist wave after wave of corpse tide, use a wide variety of weapons, surrounding terrain, traps and all available items to make yourself alive in the corpse tide. Rich scenes, a wide range of weapons, and traps. Are you ready to resist the tide of corpses? Then pick up your weapons and start fighting.

Instructions:
Left handle
Touchpad up, down, left, and right--move
Trigger button-interactive operation (open door, pick up weapon, etc.)
Menu key-call out the menu
Grip button-reset direction

Right handle
Touchpad left and right-rotate
Trigger button-fire
Menu key-call out the menu
Under the touchpad-jump
Grip button-switch weapons
